Transcription for 547506

I am lost and clear and I, a girl near all I miss.
I am lost and clear and I, a girl near all I miss.
I am lost and clear and I, a girl near all I miss.
I am lost and clear and I, a girl near all I miss.
It came upon the midnight clear, that glorious song of old.
From angels bending near the earth to touch their hearts of gold.
Peace on the earth would build to him, a man of gracious king.
A world in silence, clear as day, to hear the angels sing.
In Welsh, Alhananos and Gleed and Thar.
Here, a free one.
I am lost and clear and I, a girl near all I miss.
It came upon the midnight clear, that glorious song of old.
From angels bending near the earth to touch their hearts of gold.
And I am in this covered place, round down my rock in hell.
